name: Golden Patient - ULTRA COMPREHENSIVE Test Suite Patient
remarks: Gloria Martinez - 45F ULTRA COMPREHENSIVE test patient for ThetaRho AI test suites
MASSIVELY ENHANCED for complex query testing: trends, comparisons, temporal analysis
COMPREHENSIVE RESOURCE COVERAGE - ALL TRDataServices resource types with HIGH VOLUME
LABS: 10+ CBC, 12+ HbA1c, 10+ CMP, 10+ Lipid, 8+ Thyroid, 10+ Kidney function panels
IMAGING: 8+ studies (Multiple X-Rays, Echos, CT, MRI, Ultrasound, Retinal photos)
MEDICATIONS: 20+ orders (initial prescriptions, dose titrations, refills, switches, discontinuations)
PROCEDURES: 15+ procedures (exams, training, injections, counseling, screenings)
CARE PLANS: 4 comprehensive care plans with goals and activities
ENCOUNTERS: 14 encounters over 18 months (initial, follow-ups, emergency, wellness, specialty)
Trend testing: HbA1c 9.5% → 6.5%, Glucose 210 → 105, BP 158/98 → 128/82, Weight 95kg → 82kg
Type 2 Diabetes + Hypertension + Hyperlipidemia + Hypothyroidism + CKD Stage 2
SUFFICIENT data for: 'last 3 CBC', 'last 5 HbA1c', 'HbA1c trend', 'lipid improvement', 'BP control'
Immunizations (auto-generated by Synthea), Allergies, Social History, Comprehensive Vitals at every visit

goals.text: Reduce body weight by 5-10% over 6 months

activities.display: Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension diet (regime/therapy)

goals.text: Reduce sodium intake to less than 2300 mg per day

codes.display: Lifestyle education regarding hypertension, diabetes, and hyperlipidemia (procedure)

goals.text: Control blood pressure to slow progression
